Case_ID.description: Unique identifier for a patient case.

Tumor/Normal.description: Indicates whether a sample is tumor tissue (T), normal tissue (N), or tumor adjacent normal (TN).

Age.description: Age of the patient in years.

BMI.description: Body Mass Index of the patient, calculated as weight in kilograms divided by the square of height in meters.

Race.description: The self-identified race of the patient.
enum: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

Ethnicity_Self_Identify.description: The self-identified ethnicity of the patient.
enum: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

Tumor_Site.description: The primary anatomical site where the tumor is located.

Tumor_Site_Other.description: Additional free-text description or specific details about the tumor's anatomical site, when 'Tumor_Site' is 'Other' or needs further clarification.

Tumor_Size_cm.description: The maximum dimension of the tumor measured in centimeters.

Tumor_Focality.description: Describes whether the tumor is singular or multiple.

Histologic_Type.description: The histological classification of the tumor.

Grade.description: The tumor grade, indicating the degree of cellular differentiation and aggressiveness (e.g., Fuhrman or WHO/ISUP grade for kidney cancer).

Tumor_Stage_Pathological.description: The overall pathological stage of the tumor, determined by microscopic examination of resected tissue.

Path_Stage_Primary_Tumor_pT.description: The pathological T (primary tumor) stage component of the TNM classification system, describing the size and extent of the primary tumor.

Path_Stage_Reg_Lymph_Nodes_pN.description: Pathological N-stage (regional lymph node involvement) indicating the extent of cancer spread to regional lymph nodes, based on pathological examination.
